features]. The same CNN model must be applied to each input subsequence. We can achieve
this by wrapping the entire CNN model in a TimeDistributed layer wrapper.
# define CNN input model
model = Sequential()
model.add(TimeDistributed(Conv1D(filters=n_filters, kernel_size=n_kernel,
activation=' relu' , input_shape=(None,n_steps,1))))
model.add(TimeDistributed(Conv1D(filters=n_filters, kernel_size=n_kernel,
activation=' relu' )))
model.add(TimeDistributed(MaxPooling1D(pool_size=2)))
